price: Isaafi maatii isaa nagaya baasne. Niitiin isaa malee isiin warra (adabbii keessatti) hafan irraa taate.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَأَهۡلَهُۥٓ إِلَّا ٱمۡرَأَتَهُۥ كَانَتۡ مِنَ ٱلۡغَٰبِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-ahlahu illā im'ra-atahu kānat mina al-ghābirīna
